from stagesepx import toolbox
 
 
 with toolbox.video_capture("./demo.mp4") as cap:
     size = toolbox.get_frame_size(cap)
     print(size)
 
     _, frame = cap.read()
     print(frame.shape)

video_path = "../demo.mp4"

 video.add_preload_hook(hook)
 video.add_preload_hook(save_hook)
